body:
It actually looks good at the moment in my opinion. It's definitely an improvement from 1.8 but R.I.P Hybrid Blockhitters :/
https://youtu.be/tTFeRX6b9bQ
^.^ Below, write your opinion on it! We should most likely go to 1.9 when it comes out.
Edit: RIP PvP. In Minecraft's latest update, they kinda ruined PvP. There's no skill involved in it now, we use aiming and Strafing which requires skill but timing requires none to be honest. RIP PvP 4Ever & Ever.
https://youtu.be/dnLUOa1q39E

replies.body:
Has a lot of mechanics and it looks smooth enough in my opinion. This makes pot pvp more difficult however xD

The arrow that outlines entities will create great tactical gameplay especially for monument defenders who have access to tag tunnelers for everyone to see.

I do not get what the huge backlash is about.

replies.body:
Looks good, but is it true that shields block all arrow damage? It was hard to see in the video. And I also heard that swords do half a heart of damage if the person uses a shield, which sounded kinda bleh.

Mojang is finally going to back to releasing decent updates, it seems. :)

replies.body:
Honestly, I was expecting this update to be a lot worse but it really isn't now that I've seen a decently made video about it. I also heard somekind of misleading info aimed to this update ruining the game through it's pvp bases but hey, Mojang made something good for once and I gotta admit this looks extremely fun to play, more skill will be needed and the game overall won't be as boring as it used to be by now.
EDIT: Or should I say Microsoft? Not sure.
